items.title: ACERBIS K035 BK - fekete térdvédő
items.desc: Térdvédő ACERBIS K035 BK - fekete térdvédő:Protective knee brace for motocross and enduro. The K035 knee brace provides impact protection and reduces knee hyperextension. Both lightweight and durable, this protector fea…
items.raw_desc:
Térdvédő ACERBIS K035 BK - fekete térdvédő:Protective knee brace for motocross and enduro. 
The K035 knee brace provides impact protection and reduces knee hyperextension. Both lightweight and durable, this protector features a honeycomb outer shell and an advanced design that uses hexagonal cell geometry to efficiently distribute and absorb impact energy, achieving an optimal balance between light weight and strength. 

The outer layer combined with a perforated inner lining material provides stability and ventilation. 
The double-joint mechanism and semi-rigid plastic construction are designed to meet Level 2 certification and offer strength, comfort and adaptability of knee movement during the ride.
